data.text: Davide ɓegai ma ga ɓɔɛ Sayile ʋɔ, Zonatan ɠilini Davide ʋa ziimaʋɛ. É Davide nɛɛni ʋɛ, eɠɛ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi.
Naama voloi, Sayile la ɠɛni ɓeni Davide ʋa, é ʋa li kɛɛɠɛ ʋɔ bɛ, é Davide makɛni ɠoba.
Zonatan ta Davide ti minazeɠe boni yɔɠɔzu, tɔɔzei Zonatan Davide nɛɛni ʋɛ, eɠɛ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi.
É ná-seɠe wolai ɠulani ɠɔba, é fe Davide ʋɛ, naa ʋɛɛ ná-kɔɔɠɔ zeɠeiti ba, é ná-boɠa zɔkpɔi ta ná-mɛɛinti feeni Davide ʋɛ, ta ná-saamaɠiligi.
Ʋɛ nɔpɛ Sayile a la Davide leʋe ná kɔɔmaʋɛ, Davide ɠɛni vɔnisu naa ma, naa ɠa é kɛɛni, Sayile pilɛni da ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti unda. Davide ná-fai wola nɛɛni bɛbɛi ʋɛ, ta Sayile ná-botiɠɛ nu wolaiti.

Davide ɓegai ma ga Filisiti nui ʋaa, ti ɠalegai ma ma, ti zeɠe kɔɔɠɔzuʋɛ, anzanuiti ti ɠulani Izilayɛle laaiti pɛ su, ti masagi Sayile laaɠomi, ti ɗa kuai wo, ti ɗa guyei loo, ga koozunɛ woo wolai, ti ɗa tamadegiti ta gɛingɛin ganigi taɠiligaani gɛin.
Ti pɛ ti ɠɛni guyei loozu ʋɔɔma ga koozunɛɛi, ti ɗa ɠɛ ma:
Sayile naama vai zeɠeni ga faa ɲɔu, é yiiɠaawana ga gola, é ɗa ɠisiɛ ga: «Ta waa seizu ʋuupuugiti feezu Davide ya, ti ɗa waa seizu ɠilagilagiti fe zèa. Masadai nɔ ɠa é la dɛ zea.»
É lɔɔzei naama voloi ma, Sayile ɠɛni wɛlɛzu Davide ʋa niina ga toloi.

Poluma voloi, GALA ge zɛnvu ɲɔi gila teʋeni, é lɔ Sayile zu, é tɔɔzei ga é ɗa kulakɛlɛma vaiti bo ná-pɛlɛi wu. Davide ɠɛni ná-kɔnigi ɠɛinsu, eɠɛʋelei é ɠɛni kɛɛzu la zɔɔma voloiti su. Sayile ná-kpɛɛin ɠɛni zoni zea.
Sayile ná-kpɛɛin ʋilini, é ɗa ɠɛ ɓɔɠɔ ma: «Nà sɔɔzu, gè kpadɔ pɛlɛi ʋa.» Kɛlɛ ná zeizu ɠɛni fele, Davide ɗa zeɠe tuɠɔ.
Sayile luani Davide ʋa, mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛni Davide ʋolu, kɛlɛ é zeɠea tɔun polu.
Naa ɠa é kɛɛni, Sayile Davide maaɠoozani la ɓɔɠɔ ʋa, é sei salaʋusu waagila (1.000) unda. Davide ta ná-salaʋusuiti, ti ɓena li kɔɔɠɔzuʋɛti.
Ʋɛ nɔpɛ Davide a la li ná, é ɠɛni zobogi zɔlɔɔsu fai pɛ su, mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛni polu.
Sayile naama vɔnifaama wolaiti kaai ma, ta ʋɛɛni ná-duai ʋa.
Kɛlɛ Davide ná-fai wola nɛɛni Izilayɛle ʋɛ, ta Zuda nuɓusɛiti pɛ bɛ, mazɔlɔɔ tɔ ɠa é ɠɛni losu ti luɠɔ ta-ɠɔɔɠɔ vaiti su.

Yeeta, Sayile ɠɛni Davide ma: «Wɔin ɠa mà ga gè dòun anzanu mɔungi Melaɓe ve è ʋɛ ga vului, ni ɗa ɠɛna bɛ̀ ga kɔɔɠuluɓa wola, è ɗa lo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-kɔɔiti tuɠɔ.» Naa wosuʋɛ bɛ, é ɠɛni ɠisiɛzu ga: «Nà ɓɔɠɔi gè la paazu, Filisiti nuiti ka ti paazu.»
Davide gooɠaaʋoteni, é ɠɛ ma: «Nà ga leeni, ɓaa tosuʋɛ ɓɛgele ɠa é kɛ̀ɛ ʋɛlɛi ʋa, Izilayɛle yooi zu, gè ɠɛ ga masagi nɛkoi?»
Kɛlɛ siɛgi zeeliai ma, ga Sayile ná-doun anzanui Melaɓe ve Davide ya ga anzai, kɛɛɠɛ tatini, é fe Meɠola nui Adiliyɛle ya ga vului.
Sayile ná-doun anzanui velesiɛi, nii daa ɠɛni ga Mikale, naa Davide nɛɛni ʋɛ. Sayile mɛnigai ma, koozunɛɛni ga gola.
Mazɔlɔɔ é ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ɓɔɠɔ ma: «Nà feezu bɛ ga vului, nii a kɛ, é ɠɛ bɛ ga balii, Filisiti nuiti ti paa.» Sayile ɠɛni Davide ma ʋolu: «Ɗa zoo è ɠɛ ga nɛ̀koi niina.»
Sayile ɠɛni ná-botiɠɛ nu wolaiti ma, ti ɓɔɛ Davide ʋɔ ga pagɔ, ti ɠɛ ma: «Ɗa-vai nɛa masagi ta ná-nuɓusɛiti bɛ. Va bu za ga è ɠɛ ga masagi nɛkoi.»

Sayile ná-botiɠɛ nu wolaiti ti liini, ti naama wooiti daazeeli Davide ma. Kɛlɛ Davide ti wooɠaaʋoteni ga: «Toɠa wo ɠaazu ga faa go ɓaa, ga nɔ̀un gè ɠɛ ga masagi nɛkoi? Nà ga bala nu nɔ, ta tosu wola la bà.»
Sayile ná-botiɠɛ nu wolaiti ti liini, ti Davide ná-gooɠaaʋotegi laazeeli Sayile ma.

Sayile ɠɛni ti ma: «À ɠɛ Davide ma: ‹Masagi la vulu zɔngɔ ɠaiziɛzu ná-doun anzanui vaa zu. Nii nɔ wɔin ma, naa ɠa é ga, zunu ani laayɔɓɔ ungila (100), Filisiti nuiti saama, naa ɠa é ɠɛɛzu ga ná-wanaɠulai sili nuiti ba.› » Sayile naa woni, nii a kɛ, é Davide undaaʋili Filisiti nuiti zea.
Sayile ná-botiɠɛ nu wolaiti ti ʋaani, ti naa wo Davide ma. Naama wooi Davide ɛnɛkɛni, nii a kɛ, é ɠɛ ga masagi nɛkoi. Kui nii masagi toni, naa ʋa ɠɛ é zeeli,

Davide ta ná-kɔɔɠɔ nuiti ti liini ti Filisiti nu unfelegɔ (200) ʋa, ti naati ta-zunu aniiti daayɔɓɔgiti teʋe. Davide ʋaani ga ti pɛ gaavɔnigai, é fe masagi ya, nii a kɛ, é ɠɛ ga naa nɛkoi. Sayile ná-doun anzanui Mikale veeni Davide ʋɛ ga anza.
Sayile gaaɠaai ma ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa Davide ʋa, ta Davide nɛɛʋɛ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi ná-doun anzanui Mikale ʋɛ,
Sayile ná-dualuagi wɔɔlɔni, é lo Davide ʋa, é ɠɛni naa wɔinzeɠezu niina nɔ yeenɔpɛ.

Naama ziɛgi zu, Filisiti ɠundiɠiiti ti ɠɛni liizu ga kɔɔi, Izilayɛle nuiti daalɔɠɔma. Kɛlɛ ti lii laa ɠilagila ga kɔɔi, Davide ɓena zobo sɔlɔɔ gola, é leʋe Sayile ná-kɔɔɠuluɓaiti pɛ ba. Naa ɠa é kɛɛni, tɔɠɔi ɠulani gola.
